title: Baby take my hand, I want you to be my husband

replies.msg:
'Cause you're my Iron Man
And I love you 3000
Baby, take a chance
'Cause I want this to be something
Straight out of a Hollywood movie

https://youtu.be/aR8riizqSSA

看著你的雙眼
又一次的見面
心裡有話想說
但又怕我說錯
想盡辦法
擔心氣氛尷尬
如果今天不說就沒機會了

從第一次見你就該說了
說哪天你會穿上婚紗
走遍世界，牽著你手
看著月亮，帶著你走
對你說

Baby, take my hand
I just want to be your husband
'Cause I'm your Iron Man
And I love you 3000
Baby, take a chance
'Cause I want this to be something
Straight out of a Hollywood movie

...

♥️
